Key Match Events: Ryan Christie scored the first goal for Scotland in the 33rd minute

Andrej Kramaric scored the winning goal for Croatia in the 70th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Scotland suffered their third straight defeat in Group 1 of the UEFA Nations League
Miscellaneous Highlights: The absence of several key players due to injuries affected Scotland's performance
